name: Mary Skelter 2: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Kangokutou Mary Skelter 2
Special Box: Kei Nanameda-illustrated
Soundtrack CD (21-song)
Special book (featuring artwork and a special contribution by Yomoji Otono)
Bath poster
Multi-desktop calendar
Treasured data materials CD-ROM
Original PC and smartphone wallpapers
